thread.title: Vanessa Hudgens revealed the secret to making her long-distance relationship work
thread.title_full: Vanessa Hudgens revealed the secret to making her long-distance relationship work

author: Trilby Beresford
title: Vanessa Hudgens revealed the secret to making her long-distance relationship work
text:
Vanessa Hudgens revealed the secret to making her long-distance relationship work Relationships are hard enough when the people involved live near each other, but when you throw in geography as a factor ‚Äî ugh, that‚Äôs really tricky territory.
In an interview with People , Vanessa Hudgens talked about making long-distance love work with her BF Austin Butler (who‚Äôs working on MTV‚Äôs The Shannara Chronicles in New Zealand), and we are all ears! Her advice is super simple, and can actually be applied to any relationship in life. Because above all else, she emphasizes that ‚Äúcommunication is key.‚Äù
‚ÄúI think that if anything‚Äôs bothering you, don‚Äôt hold it in. Always bring it up and just talk about it. Uncensor yourself and just be open,‚Äù she said. via GIPHY 
Good communication skills will always serve you well in life, in relationships and beyond.
via GIPHY A couple of days ago, Hudgens posted this happy snap of herself kissing her honey. The hashtag ‚ÄúLong Distance Sucks‚Äù is right on the mark, though from her recent comments, they seem to be doing okay.
Missing this guy. #mcm #longdistancesucks 
A post shared by Vanessa Hudgens (@vanessahudgens) on Mar 20, 2017 at 10:53am PDT 
Hudgens is currently working on the NBC series Powerless, so both members of this team are separated for good reasons (they‚Äôre making awesome entertainment for us to enjoy!). We just hope they can be reunited in the flesh as soon as possible, because we‚Äôd like more lovey-dovey pictures they deserve some quality face time.
HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO THE LOVE OF MY LIFE @austinbutler you make life better ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è happy 25th birthday baby‚ù§Ô∏è ü§ó 
A post shared by Vanessa Hudgens (@vanessahudgens) on Aug 17, 2016 at 12:17pm PDT 
If you do find yourself in a long-distance relationship, know that so many people are dealing with the same issue and just taking it one day at a time.
